response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. This product has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering the value it brings, I am offering it to you for $150. If this aligns with your expectations, I would be delighted to proceed with the transaction. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 150}
